resources.string: There\'s no internet available and we don\'t have any data saved
The origin or the destination are not set
There are no current times for this pair of stations
Type the name of a station
Schedules offered by Rodalies de Catalunya
Show more trains that you can go into in your transfer station going to the same destination
Show only the trains from the transfer station if the origin train is the same
Show schedules from all the day
Don\'t show the schedules for all day
Don\'t show more trains from the transfer station
Show the origin train duplicated if there are more trains from the transfer station that leave before any train from the origin
This application is a widget. If you don\'t know how to use it we encourage you to follow this tutorial.\n\nTouch SKIP to access directly to the configuration.

In the Android devices there are this kind of applications called widgets that allow to view updated information, like the train schedules, quickly from our desktop.

To add a widget you just need to go to the main screen and press in blank space and a menu will show up.

You have an example in the next slide.
You just need to search for the widget in the list that will appear
Access the configuration of the widget touching the START button
